original: Kristofersson, Sture Anders Krister, lektor, Karlskrona, f. 5/3/09’ i Skivarp, Malmöh. 1., av Kristofer Jönsson o. Hanna Andersdotter. G. 38 m. Signe Olsson. Barn: Hans f. 42, Martin 44, Ola 46. — Studrex. i Lund 27, teol. fil. ex. där 30, teol. kand. o. prakt, teol. prov 33, teol. lic. 37, disp. f. gr. o. prästv. 39, teol. dr 41, provår 42-43. Genomg. res:off:kurs 39-40, fänrik 40. Timlär. i Karlstad 41, e. adj. där 41-42, bitr. lär. 42-43, lektor i kristend :kunsk. v. Karlskrona h. a. 1. sed. 44. Skr.: Kärleksåskådn. i passionspsalmen (38), Psalmboksförsl. av år 1765-67 o. 1793 (akad. avh. 39).
translated: Kristofersson, Sture Anders Krister, lecturer, Karlskrona, b. 5/3/09' in Skivarp, Malmöhus. 1st child of Kristofer Jönsson and Hanna Andersdotter. Married in 1938 to Signe Olsson. Children: Hans b. 1942, Martin b. 1944, Ola b. 1946. — Studied at Lund University in 1927, obtained a degree in theology and philosophy in 1930, completed practical theological exams in 1933, obtained a theological license in 1937, defended a thesis for a higher theological degree and ordination as a priest in 1939, obtained a doctorate in theology in 1941, completed a reserve officer's course in 1939-1940 and became a Lieutenant in 1940. Worked as an hourly teacher in Karlstad in 1941, as an assistant teacher in Karlstad in 1941-1942, as a deputy teacher in 1942-1943, and as a lecturer in Christian knowledge at Karlskrona from autumn 1944. Writings include: Perspective on Love in the Passion Hymn (1938), Proposed Hymn Book from 1765-1767 and 1793 (doctoral thesis in 1939).
